name: Crazy Joe's Coffee Run
description:
Instructions

Phone: 

1. Swipe left & right

2. Tap far left & right screen

Computer: 

1. left & right arrow keys

2. click/hold mouse and move back and forth

Back Story:

Joe, a coffee fanatic, is late to work. Joe couldn't find his keys and decided to run to work since it's nearby where he lives. KAWW!! A bird scares Joe and caused him to throw his coffee in the air.  As Joe tries to catch the coffee, since he needs it to keep going throughout the workday, the bird gets a taste of the coffee and HATES it! Try to help Joe catch as much coffee as possible as the bird tries to ruin it with his own version of coffee creamer.

Enjoy the Game & Support if you please!
